*div1 type="summary"* *p*Jesse Thompson and J. C. Peyton to Austin, August 11,1826. Distress at prospect of abolition of slavery. Intention to hasten back to the united States. Trouble in Edwards's colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-11-1826">11th August 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Frend I fondly Employ my pen to let you know I am well though my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*is not veary well they are on the mend theare has not been any veary daingerous caises in my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*hoping these few lines may find you and *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*Enjoying good health,*/p*
*p*Dear frend I have been Enjoying myself as well as any man on Earth could in my circumstances, until I have acquired the disagreeable information of the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*within the last Twelve Hours, relative to the prohibition of slavery within this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*whitch information I have acquired from such *person_mentioned*sources */person_mentioned*as leaves no doubt on the subject upon whitch I Fell [feel] my self Entirely ruined from the moast flatering prospects. I feel as though I shall make every arangement so soon as is practicable to be in the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* with my *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*this I communicate for your information, at the same time I am compeled to in join secracy on your part; I truely regret the change of prospects being highly pleased with the *location_mentioned*cuntery */location_mentioned*whitch is completely throne into dispear; I wish you to consult your interest and do accordingly as you may think best Theare is hardly any room for doubt on the subject of our having to relinquish the right of slavery.*/p*
*p*I shall conclude having nothing more to comunicate of importance; you may expect to see me shortly I am as ever your Frend and Obt. Servt.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jessee Thompson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Frend I beg leave to address you a fiew lines to let you know I am yet living and *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*all enjoying good health excepting my little son *person_mentioned*Alexander */person_mentioned*he having a attack of the Fever though he appears to be better, most fortunately praying those few lines may find you and *person_mentioned*Family */person_mentioned*Enjoying good health peace and prosperity I have nothing more to comunicate than is in the above whitch is reather unpleasant to me who have a knowledge of the most provable fact; on my own part I am undetermined what I shall do not being veary well satisfyed with the Tratement I have recd- from our *person_mentioned*Empresario*/person_mentioned*; I must conclude by subscribing my self your true frend until death*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. C. Payton*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear sir I again Enjoin it on you as secracy not Let your best *person_mentioned*frends */person_mentioned*no it at least the *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*might get hold of it and you no the nature of a greate many people in hast yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jesse Thompson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*John Spowl. Esqr.*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*deastrict Ayush Bayou*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
